sections.text:
49-1477.Contributions from persons other than committee; information required; violation; penalty.

No person shall receive a contribution from a person other than a committee unless, for purposes of the recipient person's record-keeping and reporting requirements, the contribution is accompanied by the name and address of each person who contributed more than one hundred dollars to the contribution. Any person violating the provisions of this section shall be guilty of a Class III misdemeanor.

SourceLaws 1976, LB 987, ยง 77;Laws 1977, LB 41, ยง 50;Laws 2013, LB79, ยง 23;Laws 2014, LB946, ยง 32.
